ListPreference.android:summary: How are you going to receive data from your Dexcom/Transmitter?

PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Options for scanning NFC based sensors with the phone handset
PreferenceScreen.android:title: NFC Scan features

SwitchPreference.android:summary: Allow sensors to be scanned when app is open. Historic data will be back-filled. Highly experiemental! Beware this can maybe break a sensor. Test phone compatibility with an almost expired sensor first. You have been warned!
SwitchPreference.android:title: Use NFC feature

CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Show the sensor expiry time based on 14.5 days
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Show the sensor age on the main screen
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Sensor Age or Expiry

CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: NFC scanning will only occur when xDrip+ app is visible
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: NFC scanning will also work from your app launcher screen
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Scan when not in xDrip+

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Beep when scanning within xDrip+ app

EditTextPreference.android:summary: ID of your Dexcom Transmitter, eg 12AB3

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Newer G5 firmware doesn't work with the method previously used. Experimental mode to try to resolve this.
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: TEST G5 Post Nov 2016 mode

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Some devices work better when scanning constantly, others do not. If reading is reliable when this setting is not selected, you should have improved battery life. Turn this setting on if you are missing readings at high rates and unexpected times.
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Scan for G5 constantly

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: This is crucial for some Android devices to properly connect, but can cause missed readings when other UI intensive activities are in use.
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Force G5 to UI Thread

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: This will attempt a full authentication each read attempt. Redundant if Unbond before each read is also selected.
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Authenticate G5 before each read

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: This will remove the G5 from your device's paired device list, and attempt a full authentication and bonding with each read attempt.
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Unbond G5 before each read
